transcript: I see most of my friends once or twice a year and I work in the meantime all the friends I have there is zero social obligations for anything if I don't respond to a text for 3 days there is zero drama it's not even acknowledged it's just we know that busy people understand that busy people are doing [Â __Â ] and so if everyone you have who's in your world understands that you're trying to take this hill then if they're truly your friend then they want you to take the hill more than they want you to respond to their text or come out with them for the weekend
